headline: Ask HN: Is a Mac still the best for video editing?
description:
I'm tired of dealing with issues with video editing programs on Windows. May latest issues are problems running on Windows 11. I've always heard Macs are way better for this so I'm thinking of buying one. But what about Linux? And maybe I'm doing something wrong on Windows.

So in other words, what's the best home video editing platform I can buy?

My current machine is an x64, Intel i7-9700 3.0 GHz, 8 core, 16 GB memory, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, Running Windows 11 Home
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: Mac仍然是视频编辑的最佳选择吗？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: Mac仍然是視頻編輯的最佳選擇嗎？

因此，换句话说，什么是我能买到的最好的家庭视频编辑平台？
